page.title: 17Garden Centres and Nurseries
page.content: There are 3 nurseries in North Weald. The Art Nursery nearly covers 2 acres. Only 2 people work there. They have all garden sundries and lots of plants. It has been there for about 12 years. Stacey's nursery down the road is not open to the public. They have one and a half acres or glass. They only have one crop and that is tomatoes. Opposite that is another nursery which is on derelict land. Its nearly all close down apart from one greenhouse. They also have a few fields, one was grass, another corn and wheat.
